page.description: The Alpha TransForm form filler is a mobile app used to fill out forms created using TransForm Central.

description.p: The Alpha TransForm Filler app lets you create, add data to, and upload forms for the Alpha TransForm system. It requires a valid Alpha TransForm User ID for operation.

section.note: Press and hold the [help] Help button on the List of Forms Main Control Bar to open the help info from within the Alpha TransForm form filler app.
